objects.title: Code4rena
objects.summary: A competitive auditing platform for Smart Contract Auditors to review smart contracts that are close to production deployement. There are incentives to finding High/Medium/Low vulernabilities as well as QA/Informational findings. Reports are often published after an audit has been completed and patched, allowing for further learning for the auditors on the platform.
bulletPoints: Found a medium severity finding during the Forgotten Runes audit
